body:
rapidjson gives warnings with gcc-7.3 and branch fall through

I admire the developers commitment to warning-free code, but spack cannot build this package in its present state with gcc7.

rapidjson addressed this in its git repository through gcc-specific pragmas.  For the sake of spack, however, I thought it was sufficient to just not use Werror.
title: rapidjson: "Werror" too strict for recent compilers
